text:
@realDonaldTrump @RepBost @RepAnnWagner @RoyBlunt @RepShimkus a global pandemic is impacting every dimension of American life and our President is focused on political grievances.

DJT is incapable of leading this country at this historic moment.  You took an oath. Will you stay silent?
